original_text: So what shall I do? I will pray with my spirit, but I will also pray with my understanding; I will sing with my spirit, but I will also sing with my understanding.
korean_text: 그러면 어떻게 할까 내가 영으로 기도하고 또 마음으로 기도하며 내가 영으로 찬송하고 또 마음으로 찬송하리라

sentences.original_text: I will pray with my spirit
but I will also pray with my understanding
I will sing with my spirit
but I will also sing with my understanding
